org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.event
Class PNodeSelectionHandler

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PBasicInputEventHandler
      edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PDragSequenceEventHandler
          org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.event.PNodeSelectionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PInputEventListener, java.util.EventListener
public class PNodeSelectionHandler
extends edu.umd.cs.piccolo.event.PDragSequenceEventHandler

PSelectionHandler provides standard interaction for selection. Clicking selects the object under the cursor. Shift-clicking allows multiple objects to be selected. Dragging offers marquee selection. Pressing the delete key deletes the selection by default.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ben Bederson

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

PNodeSelectionHandler

public PNodeSelectionHandler(GraphView view,
                             edu.umd.cs.piccolo.PNode marqueeParent,
                             edu.umd.cs.piccolo.PNode selectableParent,
                             edu.umd.cs.piccolo.PCamera camera)
Creates a selection event handler.

Parameters:
graphView - the GraphView to witch this handler is attached
marqueeParent - The node to which the event handler dynamically adds a marquee (temporarily) to represent the area being selected.
selectableParent - The node whose children will be selected by this event handler.
